actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975 (Public Law 94-377; 30 U.S.C. 181 et seq.).

summary.text: Amends the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975 to empower the Secretary of the Interior to prescribe the terms and conditions for permitting lessees of coal lands or deposits under such Act to acquire additional coal lands or deposits continguous to those embraced in the original leases.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1975 (Public Law 94-377; 30 U.S.C. 181 et seq.).
